prompt_base: hyperdetailed portrait of a massive, rotund creature, vibrant bubblegum pink rubbery skin texture, short black antennae-like protrusions, large black eyes with glowing pink pupils, wearing a white puffy ceremonial garment and gold belt, supernatural smile
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, volumetric rim lighting, macro detail on the matte rubber texture, subtle steam vents visible on skin surfaces, sharp focus on eyes and gold buckle
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, human proportions, fleshy texture, wrinkles, cartoon eyes, overly shiny, low quality
